item.title: Report E-2025030096
item.description:
Report E-2025030096

Identified by scraper @ 2025-03-16T21:12:33+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2025-02-08
  • City: ELKTON
  • State: MD
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: ESTES EXPRESS LINES
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 7500
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: Hepaco was dispatched to the site. Upon the contractor’s arrival, personnel observed that the released material impacted a 7’-by-7’ area. They estimated that eight (8) gallons of material were released due to a forklift puncturing two pails of product. There were two (2) impacted pails during the release. Hepaco personnel containerized the damaged pails, spent absorbents, and the saturated pallet into two (2) 55-gallon poly drums. Hepaco personnel staged the generated waste onsite before departing. The generated waste will remain onsite for the ESTES team to coordinate disposal.
